prod_short_desc: Roll into action with the NEXO KNIGHTS™ 2-in-1 battle castle!
prod_long_desc:
Fold out the 2-in-1 Fortrex's walls to switch into the detailed headquarters play set, featuring a round table, training area, prison, kitchen and more. Includes 7 minifigures: Clay Moorington, Aaron Fox, Axl, Chef Eclair, Ash Attacker and 2 Scurriers.
Build the vast rolling castle and defend the kingdom!
As featured in Cartoon Network's LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ series
Includes Clay Moorington, Aaron Fox, Axl & Ash Attacker minifigures, plus Chef Éclair & two Scurrier figures
LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
The Fortrex is over 9” high, 14” long and 14” wide when unfolded
1140 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 9 and 14 years old
